forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny to partly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and a few afternoon clouds. High 59F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 9C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 48F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 16C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 61F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 57F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low around 10C. Winds NNE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low around 50F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 61F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low 7C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 18C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High around 65F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 50F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 61F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 16C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 61F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 49F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
